channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Home secretary says she will legislate to regain power to sack chief constables – UK politics live
item.description: Shabana Mahmood tells MPs she has lost confidence in West Midlands police chief Craig Guildford over the ban on Maccabi Tel Aviv fans Here are extract...

item.title: Iran crisis live: some personnel at US military base in Qatar told to leave ‘in response to regional tensions’
item.description: Qatar says it ‘continues to implement all necessary measures to safeguard the security and safety of its citizens and residents as a top priority’ For...

item.title: Trump in fresh Greenland outburst as ministers arrive for talks with Vance – Europe live
item.description: President claims only US can protect territory and says ‘two dogsleds won’t do it’ as Danish and Greenlandic ministers hold talks with vice-president ...

item.title: At least 28 killed as crane collapses on train in Thailand
item.description: Crane in use on high-speed rail project collapses and hits passing train, causing it to derail At least 28 people in Thailand have been killed and sco...

item.title: US supreme court issues more decisions but does not rule on tariffs – live
item.description: Three opinions from the US supreme court issued on Wednesday – but the justices did not decide on major Trump tariff case Donald Trump repeated his th...

item.title: Sting pays Police bandmates more than £500,000 in royalties
item.description: The musician discovered a "historic underpayment" after being sued in London's High Court.

item.title: Spurs & Villa charged over melee after FA Cup game
item.description: Tottenham Hotspur and Aston Villa are charged with misconduct by the Football Association following a melee at the conclusion of Saturday's FA Cup gam...

item.title: Serial killer Steve Wright in court over 1999 death
item.description: The man accused of murdering Victoria Hall, 17, killed five women in 2006, it can be revealed.

item.title: US pulling some personnel from Qatar air base, official tells CBS
item.description: Officials say it is a "precautionary measure" and comes as Donald Trump weighs up whether to take action against Iran.

item.title: LA opens ticket draw for 2028 Olympics - with seats starting at $28
item.description: If chosen via the draw, fans will be notified via email and will be given a time slot to purchase tickets in April.
